data.name: Black Knight
data.description: Thrown forward in time, the Black Knight has arrived to bring the legendary Ebony Blade to bear against enemies that attack him or his allies.

starItems.name: Black Knight
starItems.description: Thrown forward in time, the Black Knight has arrived to bring the legendary Ebony Blade to bear against enemies that attack him or his allies.

1.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>60%</color> Piercing.

This attack gains additional Piercing equal to this character's Bonus Armor <color=#86e619>%</color>.

2.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>80%</color> Piercing.

This attack gains additional Piercing equal to this character's Bonus Armor <color=#86e619>%</color>.

3.description:

This attack gains additional Piercing equal to this character's Bonus Armor <color=#86e619>%</color>.

4.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>140%</color> Piercing.

This attack gains additional Piercing equal to this character's Bonus Armor <color=#86e619>%</color>.
4.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>40%</color> Piercing to primary target
Clear <color=#86e619>1</color> random positive effect

5.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>180%</color> Piercing + clear <color=#86e619>1</color> random positive effect.

This attack gains additional Piercing equal to this character's Bonus Armor <color=#86e619>%</color>.
5.nextUpgrade:
Apply +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Deflect</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>5</color>, to self or the most injured non-summoned ally
If that character is an <color=#fff568>OUT OF TIME</color> ally, apply an additional +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Deflect</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>5</color>

6.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>180%</color> Piercing + clear <color=#86e619>1</color> random positive effect.

Apply +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Deflect</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>5</color>, to self or the most injured non-summoned ally. If that character is an <color=#fff568>OUT OF TIME</color> ally, apply an additional +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Deflect</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>5</color>.

This attack gains additional Piercing equal to this character's Bonus Armor <color=#86e619>%</color>.

7.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>280%</color> Piercing + clear <color=#86e619>1</color> random positive effect.

Apply +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Deflect</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>5</color>, to self or the most injured non-summoned ally. If that character is an <color=#fff568>OUT OF TIME</color> ally, apply an additional +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Deflect</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>5</color>.

This attack gains additional Piercing equal to this character's Bonus Armor <color=#86e619>%</color>.

1.description:
Heal self for <color=#86e619>10%</color> of Max Health.

Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>50%</color> Piercing.

Enemies killed by this attack cannot be revived.

This attack gains additional Piercing equal to this character's Bonus Armor <color=#86e619>%</color>, ignores <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color>, is Unavoidable, and cannot be blocked or counterattacked.
1.nextUpgrade:
Apply <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color> to primary target
Gain <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>

2.description:
Heal self for <color=#86e619>10%</color> of Max Health.

Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>50%</color> Piercing + apply <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color>.

Gain <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>.

Enemies killed by this attack cannot be revived.

This attack gains additional Piercing equal to this character's Bonus Armor <color=#86e619>%</color>, ignores <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color>, is Unavoidable, and cannot be blocked or counterattacked.

3.description:

Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>100%</color> Piercing + apply <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color>.

Gain <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>.

Enemies killed by this attack cannot be revived.

This attack gains additional Piercing equal to this character's Bonus Armor <color=#86e619>%</color>, ignores <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color>, is Unavoidable, and cannot be blocked or counterattacked.
3.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> Piercing to primary target
Gain +<color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>3</color>

4.description:
Heal self for <color=#86e619>20%</color> of Max Health.

Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>150%</color> Piercing + apply <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color>.

Gain <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> and +<color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>3</color>.

Enemies killed by this attack cannot be revived.

This attack gains additional Piercing equal to this character's Bonus Armor <color=#86e619>%</color>, ignores <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color>, is Unavoidable, and cannot be blocked or counterattacked.
4.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> Piercing to primary target
Apply <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color> to self, <color=#86e619>1</color> random adjacent ally, and all <color=#fff568>OUT OF TIME</color> allies

5.description:
Heal self for <color=#86e619>20%</color> of Max Health.

Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>200%</color> Piercing + apply <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color>.

Gain <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> and +<color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>3</color>.

Apply <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color> to self, <color=#86e619>1</color> random adjacent ally, and all <color=#fff568>OUT OF TIME</color> allies.

Enemies killed by this attack cannot be revived.

This attack gains additional Piercing equal to this character's Bonus Armor <color=#86e619>%</color>, ignores <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color>, is Unavoidable, and cannot be blocked or counterattacked.
5.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> Piercing to primary target
Clear all negative effects from self and all allies
If negative effects removed from this character, heal self for <color=#86e619>5%</color> per negative effect removed

6.description:
Clear all negative effects from self and all allies. If negative effects removed from this character, heal self for <color=#86e619>5%</color> per negative effect removed.
Heal self for <color=#86e619>20%</color> of Max Health.

7.description:
Clear all negative effects from self and all allies. If negative effects removed from this character, heal self for <color=#86e619>5%</color> per negative effect removed.
Heal self for <color=#86e619>20%</color> of Max Health.

Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>300%</color> Piercing + apply <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color>.

Gain <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>, <color=#fff568>Safeguard</color>, and +<color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>3</color>.

Apply <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color> and <color=#fff568>Immunity</color> to self, <color=#86e619>1</color> random adjacent ally, and all <color=#fff568>OUT OF TIME</color> allies.

Enemies killed by this attack cannot be revived.

This attack gains additional Piercing equal to this character's Bonus Armor <color=#86e619>%</color>, ignores <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color>, is Unavoidable, and cannot be blocked or counterattacked.

Enemies killed by this attack cannot be revived.

This attack gains additional Piercing equal to this character's Bonus Armor <color=#86e619>%</color>, and cannot be dodged or counterattacked.
4.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>100%</color> Piercing to primary and secondary targets
Apply <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> to all <color=#fff568>BRAWLER</color> allies

Apply <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> to all <color=#fff568>BRAWLER</color> allies.

7.description:
Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>500%</color> Piercing + <color=#86e619>30%</color> of this character's Max Health as damage.

Gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>3</color>.
Apply <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> to self and all allies.
Apply <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> to all <color=#fff568>BRAWLER</color> allies.

Enemies killed by this attack cannot be revived.

This attack gains additional Piercing equal to this character's Bonus Armor <color=#86e619>%</color>, and cannot be dodged or counterattacked.

1.description:
On Spawn, gain <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>, <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns, <color=#fff568>Immunity</color>, and +<color=#86e619>5</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>5</color>.

On any turn, the first time this character has no <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, fill this character's Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>30%</color>.

When this character drops below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Health, clear <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>.
When a <color=#fff568>PROTECTOR</color> ally drops below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Health, if this character is above <color=#86e619>50%</color> Health, gain <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>.

When an enemy attacks this character or any ally, if this character has <color=#fff568>Charged</color> and does not have <color=#fff568>Exhausted</color>:
 > Clear all Barrier on that enemy.
 > Attack that enemy for <color=#86e619>30%</color> of this character's Max Health. Enemies killed by this attack cannot be revived.
 > Clear <color=#fff568>Immunity</color> on that enemy.
 > Apply <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color>, <color=#fff568>Trauma</color>, and <color=#86e619>3</color> <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> to that enemy.
 > Lose <color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.
 > This attack is Unavoidable, cannot be blocked, and gains +<color=#86e619>1,000%</color> Extra Focus.

In <color=#fff568>ARENA</color>, while this character has <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, this character's Speed Bar cannot be reduced.
Gain +<color=#86e619>40%</color> Armor. In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, gain an additional +<color=#86e619>5%</color> Armor per <color=#fff568>OUT OF TIME</color> ally.
While this character has <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color>, this character gains +<color=#86e619>500%</color> Extra Resistance.
1.nextUpgrade:
When this character drops below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Health, Barrier self for <color=#86e619>30%</color> of this character's Max Health
Fill Speed Bar by +<color=#86e619>30%</color> the first time this character has no <color=#fff568>Charged</color>

2.description:
On Spawn, gain <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>, <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns, <color=#fff568>Immunity</color>, and +<color=#86e619>5</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>5</color>.

On any turn, the first time this character has no <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, fill this character's Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>60%</color>.

When this character drops below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Health, Barrier self for <color=#86e619>30%</color> of this character's Max Health + clear <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>.
When a <color=#fff568>PROTECTOR</color> ally drops below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Health, if this character is above <color=#86e619>50%</color> Health, gain <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>.

When an enemy attacks this character or any ally, if this character has <color=#fff568>Charged</color> and does not have <color=#fff568>Exhausted</color>:
 > Clear all Barrier on that enemy.
 > Attack that enemy for <color=#86e619>30%</color> of this character's Max Health. Enemies killed by this attack cannot be revived.
 > Clear <color=#fff568>Immunity</color> on that enemy.
 > Apply <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color>, <color=#fff568>Trauma</color>, and <color=#86e619>3</color> <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> to that enemy.
 > Lose <color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.
 > This attack is Unavoidable, cannot be blocked, and gains +<color=#86e619>1,000%</color> Extra Focus.

In <color=#fff568>ARENA</color>, while this character has <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, this character's Speed Bar cannot be reduced.
Gain +<color=#86e619>40%</color> Armor. In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, gain an additional +<color=#86e619>5%</color> Armor per <color=#fff568>OUT OF TIME</color> ally.
While this character has <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color>, this character gains +<color=#86e619>500%</color> Extra Resistance.
2.nextUpgrade:
Gain +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Resistance
In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, Gain an additional +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Resistance per <color=#fff568>OUT OF TIME</color> ally

item.description: Gold is required to upgrade your character's level, abilities, and Star rank. Earn Gold in Campaign missions and Challenges.
